content.raw:
so right now

‘wamv\_gazebo’ will alwasy be set by  <param name="wamv\_gazebo" value="$\(find wamv\_gazebo\)/urdf/wamv\_gazebo.urdf.xacro"/>

and not setting 'wamv\_target' will give and error:

RLException: \[/home/marshall/vrx\_ws/src/vrx/vrx\_gazebo/launch/generate\_wamv.launch\] requires the 'wamv\_target' arg to be set
content.html:
so right now

‘wamv_gazebo’ will alwasy be set by <param name="wamv_gazebo" value="$(find wamv_gazebo)/urdf/wamv_gazebo.urdf.xacro"/>

and not setting 'wamv_target' will give and error:

RLException: [/home/marshall/vrx_ws/src/vrx/vrx_gazebo/launch/generate_wamv.launch] requires the 'wamv_target' arg to be set
